author: pderop
msg: FELIX-3910: Refactored public methods with the BlockingSerialExecutor class. Made protected the getService method.
Moved all public methods at the top of the class.

author: pderop
msg: FELIX-3910: Made final or volatile some class attributes, which are set from synchronized setters,
but possibly read from unsynchronized getters.

author: pderop
msg: FELIX-3910: Added new SerialExecutor, which blocks other invokers while a leader is executing a task.
The executor is reentrant: when one leader executing thread reschedule some runnables, the tasks are executed directly

author: reto
msg: STANBOL-1192: udate version of jena.tdb.storage to one fixin some concurrency issues
